## Discussion

If this value is `nil`, either the participant is non-spatial or there is no seat available for the participant.

# seat

**Instance Property**

The seat assigned to this participant.

## Declaration

```swift
let seat: SystemCoordinator.ParticipantState.Seat?
```

## Discussion

If this value is `nil`, either the participant is non-spatial or there is no seat available for the participant.
title: seat
